content: TITLE: Transport Document Reference Structure Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing key properties and references in the Transport Document model including identifyingCodes, document parties, and various weight/volume measurements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/ebl/v3/issuance/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - grossWeight and grossVolume renamed to cargoGrossWeight and cargoGrossVolume on CargoItem - cargoNetWeight and cargoNetVolume added on CargoItem - purchaseOrderReference renamed to purchaseOrderReferences and now allows a list of values ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Location Type Enumeration - v3.0.0 DESCRIPTION: Defines the supported location type discriminator values used to identify different location interfaces in the API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/location/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` - UNLO (unLocationLocation) - FACI (facilityLocation) - FACS (facilitySMDGLocation) - ADDR (addressLocation) - GEOL (geoLocation) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DCSA Event Types DESCRIPTION: Enumeration of the three main event types supported by the Track & Trace system: TransportEvents for transportation status, EquipmentEvents for container handling, and ShipmentEvents for documentation updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/tnt/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` TransportEvents - events regarding transportation (Arrival and Departure) EquipmentEvents - events regarding Equipment (Loading, Discharging, Gated in, Gate out, Stuffing, Stripping) ShipmentEvents - events regarding documentation (Booking, Bill of Lading, Arrival Notice, Shipment Release Message) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Location Interfaces Overview - v2.0.0 DESCRIPTION: Lists the available location interfaces that can be used to express different types of location information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/location/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` - idLocation: ability to identify a location by a unique ID - addressLocation: express a location only using an address object - facilityLocation: express a location only using a facilityCode and a facilityCodeListProvider - facilitySMDGLocation: express a location only using a facilityCode using the SMDG code - geoLocation: express a location using latitude and longitude - unLocationLocation: express a location using a UN Location Code ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: API Endpoint Updates - Events Structure DESCRIPTION: Lists the changes made to various API endpoints in v3.0.0-Beta-1, including the restructuring of events into metadata and payload sections, addition of new filter parameters, and removal of deprecated fields. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/tnt/v3/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - `/v3/events` endPoint updated:\n - description updated to be more markdown compliant\n - `eventDateTime` filter parameter added\n - `eventType` filter renamed to `eventTypes`\n - `documentTypeCode` filter renamed to `documentTypeCodes`\n - `shipmentEventTypeCode` filter renamed to `shipmentEventTypeCodes`\n - `documentReference` filter added\n - deprecated filters removed\n - response payload changed to be a list of events ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Object Property Updates DESCRIPTION: Documentation of property changes including additions, modifications and removals across API versions SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/ebl/v3/issuance/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` properties added: - transportDocumentSubReference added to TransportDocument - exportLicense and importLicense properties added - ExportLicense and ImportLicense objects added properties modified: - carrierBookingReference no longer has a Condition - countryCode is now optional on NationalCommodityCode - unNumber and naNumber renamed to UNNumber and NANumber properties removed: - routingOfConsignmentCountries removed from TransportDocument ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Domain File Naming Convention DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the SemVer-based naming pattern for domain files where X represents major version, Y represents minor version, and Z represents patch version. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` {domain file}_vX.Y.Z ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: API Endpoint Updates - Subscriptions DESCRIPTION: Documents the changes made to subscription-related endpoints, including making subscription endpoints optional and adding 501 Not Implemented responses. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/tnt/v3/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - `/v3/event-subscriptions` endPoint updated:\n - GET description updated. This endPoint is optional to implement\n - POST description updated. This endPoint is optional to implement\n - added a `501` (Not Implemented) error response ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pattern Matching Update in RegEx DESCRIPTION: Updated string pattern matching regex to prevent Catastrophic Backtracking in Transport Document validation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/ebl/v3/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: regex CODE: ``` ^\S+(\s+\S+)*$ ``` LANGUAGE: regex CODE: ``` \S(?:.*\S)?$ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: API Pattern Modification DESCRIPTION: Regular expression pattern change to prevent catastrophic backtracking in string validation SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/ebl/v3/surrender/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: regex CODE: ``` ^\S+(\s+\S+)*$ -> \S(?:.*\S)?$ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pattern Regular Expression Update DESCRIPTION: Regular expression pattern update to prevent catastrophic backtracking in string validation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/bkg/v2/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: regex CODE: ``` ^\S(?:.*\S)?$ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Regular Expression Pattern Update in YAML DESCRIPTION: Updated pattern matching expression to prevent Catastrophic Backtracking by changing from '^\S+(\s+\S+)*$' to '\S(?:.*\S)?$' for string validation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/ebl/v3/issuance/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` ^\S+(\s+\S+)*$ --> \S(?:.*\S)?$ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Location Property Pattern DESCRIPTION: Pattern requirement added to locationName field in AddressLocation interface. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/bkg/v2/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: regex CODE: ``` pattern: ^\S(?:.*\S)?$ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Domain Reference Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown links to the Event Domain documentation on SwaggerHub along with version references. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/event/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [**EVENT_DOMAIN**](https://app.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Reference Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown anchor tags and links for specific version documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/event/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [Release v3.1.0 (31 March 2023)](https://app.swaggerhub.com/domains-docs/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/3.1.0) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Reference Links for v3.0.0 DESCRIPTION: Markdown anchor tags and links for version 3.0.0 documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dcsaorg/dcsa-openapi/blob/master/domain/event/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [Release v3.0.0 (23 December 2022)](https://app.swaggerhub.com/domains-docs/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/3.0.0) ```
